# CHANGELOG

## 1.0.3

2024-12-28

- Change sanitize function, from `sanitize_key()` to `wp_unslash()`.

2024-12-28

- Fix SubmitBase::parseCallback() to get correct instances by id strings.

2024-12-28

- Fix warning caused by SubmitBase::parseStdinJson()

## 1.0.0

2024-12-23

Initial version.
